titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a survey and investigation of the site containing the graves of American Revolutionary War soldiers and sailors, located on a section of the Brooklyn Navy Yard in the city of New York.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1941)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 8/2/1993--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to survey and investigate the site containing the graves of American Revolutionary War soldiers and sailors located in the Brooklyn Navy Yard in New York City in order to avoid damage to a potential national historic treasure.
